TextRun.Label: shipping_time_message
TextRun.Value: =Switch( Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id1.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message1.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id2.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message2.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id3.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message3.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id4.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message4.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id5.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message5.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id6.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message6.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id7.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message7.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id8.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message8.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id9.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message9.Value, Fields!shipping_time.Value = Fields!shipping_time_id10.Value , Fields!shipping_time_message10.Value )

=IIF(Fields!product_price.Value = 0 AND Fields!product_type.Value = "FLYER", "-", IIF(Parameters!management_included_tax_flag.Value = false, Ceiling((Fields!product_price.Value) / (1 + Fields!product_tax_rate.Value / 100)), Ceiling(Fields!product_price.Value)))

=Fields!product_name.Value + IIf((Fields!setpromotion_name.Value <> ""), " 「" + Fields!setpromotion_name.Value + "」対象商品", "") + IIf(Parameters!product_option_settings_price_grant_enabled.Value, Environment.NewLine + (Fields!product_option_texts.Value).Replace(" ", Environment.NewLine), "")

=IIF(Fields!product_price.Value = 0 AND Fields!product_type.Value = "FLYER", "-", IIF(Parameters!management_included_tax_flag.Value = false, Ceiling(((Fields!product_price.Value) / (1 + Fields!product_tax_rate.Value / 100)) * (Fields!item_quantity.Value)), Ceiling((Fields!product_price.Value) * (Fields!item_quantity.Value))))
Paddingの値を動的に変化させて高さを調節するテキストボックス →
※1ptの半角スペースが入っています →
前ページからの続き（■受注番号：

TextRun.Label: total_page_number
TextRun.Value:
=Int(( CountRows("order_id_group") + ( Code.m_iMaxRows - Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows ) + ( Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows - Code.GetMinRowCountUntilFirstChangingPage() ) - 1 )/Code.m_iMaxRows) + 1
' ページ数 = (データ行数+(最大行数-最初のページの最大行数)+合計行-1)/20 + 1

Visibility.Hidden: =(Code.IsDisplayOwnSiteOptionArea(Code.GetMallKbn(Fields!mall_kbn.Value), Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value) = False) '返り値がFalseの場合「表示」

TextRun.Label: order_price_exchange
TextRun.Value: =IIF((Fields!order_shipping_no.Value <> Fields!shipping_no_max.Value), "最後のシートに記載", Fields!order_price_exchange.Value)

TextRun.Label: order_price_before_regulation
TextRun.Value: =IIF(Parameters!management_included_tax_flag.Value = false, Fields!order_price_subtotal.Value + Fields!order_price_subtotal_tax.Value, Fields!order_price_subtotal.Value) + Fields!order_price_shipping.Value + Fields!order_price_exchange.Value

Visibility.Hidden: =(Code.IsDisplayOwnSiteOptionArea(Code.GetMallKbn(Fields!mall_kbn.Value), Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value) = False) '返り値がFalseの場合「表示」

TextRun.Value: セットプロモーション割引額

Visibility.Hidden: =(Code.IsDisplayOwnSiteOptionArea(Code.GetMallKbn(Fields!mall_kbn.Value), ((Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value And Parameters!fixed_purchase_option_enabled.Value) = False))) '返り値がFalseの場合「表示」

=(Code.IsDisplayOwnSiteOptionArea(Code.GetMallKbn(Fields!mall_kbn.Value), ((Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value And Parameters!fixed_purchase_option_enabled.Value) = False))) '返り値がFalseの場合「表示」

=IIf ( Code.CalculateNewPageRowGroup(CountRows("order_id_group"),RowNumber("order_id_group")) = 0 , Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows = Code.GetNumberOfFirstChangingPage(CountRows("order_id_group")) , Code.m_iMaxRows = Code.GetNumberOfLastChangingPage(CountRows("row_count")) ) Or IIf ( Code.CalculateNewPageRowGroup(CountRows("order_id_group"),RowNumber("order_id_group")) = 0 , CountRows("row_count") <= Code.GetMinRowCountUntilFirstChangingPage() , CountRows("row_count") <= Code.GetMinRowCountUntilLastChangingPage() )
